title: Time-domain control of ultrahigh-frequency nanomechanical systems
title_cn: 超高频纳米机械系统的时域控制
abstract: Nanoelectromechanical systems could have applications in fields as diverse as ultrasensitive mass detection and mechanical computation, and can also be used to explore fundamental phenomena such as quantized heat conductance and quantum-limited displacement. Most nanomechanical studies to date have been performed in the frequency domain. However, applications in computation and information storage will require transient excitation and high-speed time-domain operation of nanomechanical systems. Here we show a time-resolved optical approach to the transduction of ultrahigh-frequency nanoelectromechanical systems, and demonstrate that coherent control of nanomechanical oscillation is possible through appropriate pulse programming. A series of cantilevers with resonant frequencies ranging from less than 10 MHz to over 1 GHz are characterized using the same pulse parameters.
abstract_cn: 纳米机电系统可以在超灵敏质量检测和机械计算等领域广泛应用，还可以用于探索基本现象，例如量化的热导率和量子极限位移。 迄今为止，大多数纳米力学研究都是在频域中进行的。 然而，在计算和信息存储中的应用将需要瞬态激励和纳米机械系统的高速时域操作。 在这里，我们展示了一种时间分辨光学方法，用于超高频纳米机电系统的转导，并证明了通过适当的脉冲编程可以对纳米机械振荡进行相干控制。 使用相同的脉冲参数来表征一系列悬臂，其共振频率范围从小于10MHz到大于1GHz。</ p>

title: Nanomechanical detection of itinerant electron spin flip
title_cn: 迭代电子自旋翻转的纳米力学检测
abstract: Electrons and other fundamental particles have an intrinsic angular momentum called spin. A change in the spin state of such a particle is therefore equivalent to a mechanical torque. This spin-induced torque is central to our understanding of experiments ranging from the measurement of the angular momentum of photons and the g-factor of metals to magnetic resonance and magnetization reversal in magnetic multilayers. When a spin-polarized current passes through a metallic nanowire in which one half is ferromagnetic and the other half is nonmagnetic, the spins of the itinerant electrons are ‘flipped’ at the interface between the two regions to produces a torque. Here, we report direct measurement of this mechanical torque in an integrated nanoscale torsion oscillator, and measurements of the itinerant electron spin polarization that could yield new information on the itinerancy of the d-band electrons. The unprecedented torque sensitivity of 1 × 10−22 N-m Hz−1/2 may have applications in spintronics and precision measurements of charge–parity-violating forces, and might also enable experiments on the untwisting of DNA and torque-generating molecules.
abstract_cn: 电子和其他基本粒子具有称为自旋的固有角动量。因此，这种颗粒的自旋状态的变化等于机械转矩。自旋感应转矩对于我们理解实验至关重要，这些实验涉及从光子的角动量和金属的g因子的测量到磁性多层的磁共振和磁化反转。当自旋极化电流通过金属纳米线，其中一半是铁磁性的，另一半是非磁性的时，巡回电子的自旋被“翻转”。在两个区域之间的界面处产生扭矩。在这里，我们报告了在集成纳米级扭振振荡器中此机械转矩的直接测量结果，以及对流动电子自旋极化的测量，这些测量可能产生有关d波段电子迭代的新信息。 1＆＃160;＆＃215;＆＃160; 10 ＆＃8722; 22 ＆＃160; N-m＆＃160; Hz ＆＃8722; 1 / 2 可能在自旋电子学中和电荷的奇偶校验力的精确测量中应用，并且还可能使DNA和扭转分子的解旋实验成为可能。

title: Giant negative thermal expansion in magnetic nanocrystals
title_cn: 磁性纳米晶体中的巨大负热膨胀
abstract: Most solids expand when they are heated, but a property known as negative thermal expansion has been observed in a number of materials, including the oxide ZrW2O8 (ref. ) and the framework material ZnxCd1−x(CN)2 (refs). This unusual behaviour can be understood in terms of low-energy phonons, while the colossal values of both positive and negative thermal expansion recently observed in another framework material, Ag3[Co(CN)6], have been explained in terms of the geometric flexibility of its metal–cyanide–metal linkages. Thermal expansion can also be stopped in some magnetic transition metal alloys below their magnetic ordering temperature, a phenomenon known as the Invar effect, and the possibility of exploiting materials with tuneable positive or negative thermal expansion in industrial applications has led to intense interest in both the Invar effect and negative thermal expansion. Here we report the results of thermal expansion experiments on three magnetic nanocrystals—CuO, MnF2 and NiO—and find evidence for negative thermal expansion in both CuO and MnF2 below their magnetic ordering temperatures, but not in NiO. Larger particles of CuO and MnF2 also show prominent magnetostriction (that is, they change shape in response to an applied magnetic field), which results in significantly reduced thermal expansion below their magnetic ordering temperatures; this behaviour is not observed in NiO. We propose that the negative thermal expansion effect in CuO (which is four times larger than that observed in ZrW2O8) and MnF2 is a general property of nanoparticles in which there is strong coupling between magnetism and the crystal lattice.
abstract_cn: 大多数固体在加热时会膨胀，但是在包括氧化物ZrW 2 O 8 （ ref。＆＃160;）和骨架材料Zn x Cd 1＆＃8722; x （CN） 2 （参考）。可以用低能声子来理解这种异常行为，而最近在另一种骨架材料Ag 3 [Co（CN） 6中观察到了正负热膨胀的巨大值]已根据其金属氰化物金属键的几何柔性进行了解释。在某些磁性过渡金属合金中，热膨胀也可以在低于其磁有序温度时停止，这种现象称为因瓦效应，在工业应用中利用具有可调节的正或负热膨胀材料的可能性已经引起了人们对两者的浓厚兴趣。因瓦效应和负热膨胀。在这里，我们报告了三种磁性纳米晶体CuO，MnF 2 和NiO＆＃8212的热膨胀实验的结果，并发现了CuO和MnF 2都具有负热膨胀的证据。低于其磁有序温度，但不在NiO中。较大的CuO和MnF 2 颗粒也表现出显着的磁致伸缩性（也就是说，它们会随着施加的磁场而改变形状），从而导致在其磁序温度以下的热膨胀显着降低。在NiO中未观察到此行为。我们认为，CuO和MnF 2 的负热膨胀效应（是ZrW 2 O 8 的负热效应的四倍）是磁性和晶格之间具有强耦合的纳米粒子的一般性质。

title: Detection of heating in current-carrying molecular junctions by Raman scattering
title_cn: 通过拉曼散射检测载流分子结中的热
abstract: As the scaling of electronic components continues, local heating will have an increasing influence on the stability and performance of nanoscale electronic devices. In particular, the low heat capacity of molecular junctions means that it will be essential to understand local heating and heat conduction in these junctions. Here we report a method for directly monitoring the effective temperature of current-carrying junctions with surface enhanced Raman spectroscopy (SERS) that involves measuring both the Stokes and anti-Stokes components of the Raman scattering. All the Raman-active modes in our system show similar heating as a function of bias at room temperature, which suggests fast vibrational relaxation processes inside the junctions. These results demonstrate the power of direct spectroscopic probing of heating and cooling processes in nanostructures.
abstract_cn: 随着电子组件的规模不断扩大，局部加热将对纳米级电子设备的稳定性和性能产生越来越大的影响。 尤其是，分子结的低热容量意味着必须了解这些结中的局部加热和热传导。 在这里，我们报告了一种通过表面增强拉曼光谱（SERS）直接监测载流结的有效温度的方法，该方法涉及测量拉曼散射的斯托克斯和反斯托克斯分量。 我们系统中的所有拉曼激活模式在室温下均表现出相似的加热特性，这是偏置的函数，这表明结点内部的振动松弛过程很快。 这些结果证明了直接光谱探测纳米结构中加热和冷却过程的能力。</ p>

title: Flying plasmonic lens in the near field for high-speed nanolithography
title_cn: 在近场飞行等离子透镜，用于高速纳米光刻
abstract: The commercialization of nanoscale devices requires the development of high-throughput nanofabrication technologies that allow frequent design changes. Maskless nanolithography, including electron-beam and scanning-probe lithography, offers the desired flexibility but is limited by low throughput. Here, we report a new low-cost, high-throughput approach to maskless nanolithography that uses an array of plasmonic lenses that ‘flies’ above the surface to be patterned, concentrating short-wavelength surface plasmons into sub-100 nm spots. However, these nanoscale spots are only formed in the near field, which makes it very difficult to scan the array above the surface at high speed. To overcome this problem we have designed a self-spacing air bearing that can fly the array just 20 nm above a disk that is spinning at speeds of between 4 and 12 m s−1, and have experimentally demonstrated patterning with a linewidth of 80 nm. This low-cost nanofabrication scheme has the potential to achieve throughputs that are two to five orders of magnitude higher than other maskless techniques.
abstract_cn: 纳米级设备的商业化要求开发高通量的纳米制造技术，该技术允许频繁的设计变更。无掩模纳米光刻技术，包括电子束光刻技术和扫描探针光刻技术，可提供所需的灵活性，但受到低通量的限制。在这里，我们报告了一种新的低成本，高通量的无掩模纳米光刻技术，该方法使用了“飞”的等离子透镜阵列。在要图案化的表面上方，将短波长表面等离激元集中到100 nm以下的斑点中。然而，这些纳米级斑点仅在近场中形成，这使得很难在表面上方高速扫描阵列。为克服此问题，我们设计了一种自定距空气轴承，该轴承可以使阵列在磁盘上飞行20纳米，而磁盘的旋转速度为4到12 m。 8722; 1 ，并通过实验证明了线宽为80＆＃160; nm的图案。这种低成本的纳米制造方案有可能实现比其他无掩模技术高2到5个数量级的吞吐量。

title: Wideband-tuneable, nanotube mode-locked, fibre laser
title_cn: 宽带可调谐，纳米管锁模光纤激光器
abstract: Ultrashort-pulse lasers with spectral tuning capability have widespread applications in fields such as spectroscopy, biomedical research and telecommunications. Mode-locked fibre lasers are convenient and powerful sources of ultrashort pulses, and the inclusion of a broadband saturable absorber as a passive optical switch inside the laser cavity may offer tuneability over a range of wavelengths. Semiconductor saturable absorber mirrors are widely used in fibre lasers, but their operating range is typically limited to a few tens of nanometres, and their fabrication can be challenging in the 1.3–1.5 µm wavelength region used for optical communications. Single-walled carbon nanotubes are excellent saturable absorbers because of their subpicosecond recovery time, low saturation intensity, polarization insensitivity, and mechanical and environmental robustness. Here, we engineer a nanotube–polycarbonate film with a wide bandwidth (>300 nm) around 1.55 µm, and then use it to demonstrate a 2.4 ps Er3+-doped fibre laser that is tuneable from 1,518 to 1,558 nm. In principle, different diameters and chiralities of nanotubes could be combined to enable compact, mode-locked fibre lasers that are tuneable over a much broader range of wavelengths than other systems.
abstract_cn: 具有光谱调谐能力的超短脉冲激光器在光谱学，生物医学研究和电信等领域具有广泛的应用。锁模光纤激光器是超短脉冲的方便且强大的来源，并且在激光器腔内包含宽带可饱和吸收体作为无源光开关可以在一定波长范围内提供可调性。半导体可饱和吸收镜广泛用于光纤激光器中，但其工作范围通常限制在几十纳米，并且其制造在波长为1.3＆＃8211; 1.5＆＃160;＆＃181; m的地区可能具有挑战性用于光通信。单壁碳纳米管由于其亚皮秒的恢复时间，低饱和强度，极化不灵敏性以及机械和环境稳健性，因此是出色的可饱和吸收剂。在这里，我们设计了纳米碳纳米管薄膜，其宽带宽（＆gt; 300＆＃160; nm）在1.55＆＃160;＆＃181; m附近，然后用它来演示2.4ps.ps Er。掺有<sup> 3 + </ sup>的光纤激光器，可将波长从1,518调整到1,558＆＃160; nm。原则上，可以组合使用不同直径和手性的纳米管，以实现紧凑的锁模光纤激光器，该激光器可以在比其他系统更大的波长范围内进行调谐。</ p>

title: Carbon nanotubes as templates for polymerized lipid assemblies
title_cn: 碳纳米管作为聚合脂质组装的模板
abstract: Amphiphilic molecules—molecules that have both hydrophobic and hydrophilic properties—can self-assemble in water to form diverse structures such as micelles, vesicles and tubes, and these nanostructures can be used for delivering drugs, stabilizing membrane proteins or as nanoreactors. We have previously shown that lipids can self-organize on the surface of single-walled carbon nanotubes into regular ring-shaped assemblies. Here we show that these lipid assemblies can be polymerized and isolated from the nanotube template by application of an electric field. We also demonstrate that these assemblies are monodispersed, water-soluble, and can dissolve various hydrophobic rylene dyes, fullerenes and membrane proteins. The stability of these constructs and their diverse applications will be useful in the fields of cosmetics, medicine and material sciences.
abstract_cn: 具有疏水性和亲水性的两亲性分子可以在水中自组装形成各种结构，例如胶束，囊泡和管，这些纳米结构可用于递送药物，稳定膜蛋白 或作为纳米反应器。 先前我们已经表明，脂质可以在单壁碳纳米管的表面上自组织成规则的环形组件。 在这里，我们表明可以通过施加电场将这些脂质组装体聚合并从纳米管模板中分离出来。 我们还证明了这些程序集是单分散的，水溶性的，并且可以溶解各种疏水性对苯二酚染料，富勒烯和膜蛋白。 这些构建体的稳定性及其不同的应用将在化妆品，医学和材料科学领域有所帮助。</ p>

title: Upscaling, integration and electrical characterization of molecular junctions
title_cn: 分子连接的升级，集成和电学表征
abstract: The ultimate target of molecular electronics is to combine different types of functional molecules into integrated circuits, preferably through an autonomous self-assembly process. Charge transport through self-assembled monolayers has been investigated previously, but problems remain with reliability, stability and yield, preventing further progress in the integration of discrete molecular junctions. Here we present a technology to simultaneously fabricate over 20,000 molecular junctions—each consisting of a gold bottom electrode, a self-assembled alkanethiol monolayer, a conducting polymer layer and a gold top electrode—on a single 150-mm wafer. Their integration is demonstrated in strings where up to 200 junctions are connected in series with a yield of unity. The statistical analysis on these molecular junctions, for which the processing parameters were varied and the influence on the junction resistance was measured, allows for the tentative interpretation that the perpendicular electrical transport through these monolayer junctions is factorized.
abstract_cn: 分子电子学的最终目标是将不同类型的功能分子组合成集成电路，最好是通过自主的自组装过程。以前已经研究了通过自组装单分子层进行的电荷传输，但是在可靠性，稳定性和产率方面仍然存在问题，从而阻止了离散分子结的集成进一步发展。在这里，我们提出了一种技术，可以在单个150 mm晶圆上同时制造超过20,000个分子结，每个结由金底部电极，自组装的烷硫醇单层，导电聚合物层和金顶部电极组成。它们的集成以字符串形式展示，其中多达200个结点串联连接，产生了一个整体。通过对这些分子结的统计分析，可以改变工艺参数并测量对结电阻的影响，从而可以初步解释通过这些单层结的垂直电迁移。
